snippet: Hewlett-Packard's cloud computing offering will premiere soon, with features like an applications store, analytics and developer tools. The company is not targeting Amazon Web Services as much as offering a more business-oriented service designed to...
abstract: Hewlett-Packard's cloud computing offering will premiere soon, with features like an applications store, analytics and developer tools. The company is not targeting Amazon Web Services as much as offering a more business-oriented service designed to make entry difficult for I.B.M. and Oracle. It is also meant to showcase H.P.'s servers.

headline.main: H.P. Attempts to Take On Amazon's Cloud Service
